mapper.insert: insert into xt_glyxx (GLYBH, ZZBM, GLYMC, JSBH, GLYZC, GLYLXFS, GLYCSRQ, DLZH, DLMM, GLYZT, YDLSBCS, KYDLSBCS, DLSBSDSJ, CJSJ, CJRBH, CZSJ, CZRBH) values (#{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glyzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glylxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glycsrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dlzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dlmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ydlsbcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kydlsbcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dlsbsdsj,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cjrbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{czrbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xt_glyxx set GLYBH = #{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZBM = #{zzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GLYMC = #{glymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSBH = #{jsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DLZH = #{dlzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GLYZT = #{glyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KYDLSBCS = #{kydlsbcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZSJ = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CZRBH = #{czrbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ZZBM = #{zzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GLYBH = #{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GLYBH, ZZBM, GLYMC, JSBH, GLYZC, GLYLXFS, GLYCSRQ, DLZH, DLMM, GLYZT, YDLSBCS, KYDLSBCS, DLSBSDSJ, CJSJ, CJRBH, CZSJ, CZRBH from xt_glyxx
select DLMM from xt_glyxx where DLZH=#{dlzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from xt_glyxx where glybh in
#{xtglyObj.glybh}
